    • getFixedColorString

      public java.lang.String getFixedColorString​(Color activeColor)
      Since insert statements for moves are not executed immediately the active player/color would change until the statement gets executed. Therefore a fixed String gets returned through this method
      Parameters:
      activeColor - The currently active color
      Returns:
      The color of the parameter as a String

    • getPlayerPositionsAsString

      public java.lang.String getPlayerPositionsAsString()
      Returns the position of all players in the following schema {{Y: posX, posY}, {R: posX, posY}, {B: posX, posY}, {G: posX, posY}} Where R=Red, Y=Yellow, G=Green, B=Blue If there are less than 4 players the number of entries shrinks
      Returns:
      The concatenation of the Strings of each player

    • calcOldTile50Pos

      public int calcOldTile50Pos​(int newTile50Pos)
      Calculates the position where the last tile was inserted from the new position of tile50 (the tile that is free to insert for the player) 00 01 02 00 10 20 30 40 50 60 11 01 ... 61 03 02 62 10 03 ... 63 04 04 64 09 05 ... 65 05 06 16 26 36 46 56 66 08 07 06 Numbers outside on of the square/board are positions a tile50 can have
      Parameters:
      newTile50Pos - The position of the current Tile50, upon which the old position gets calculated
      Returns:
      The position where the last tile was inserted

    • getOldTile50Orientation

      public int getOldTile50Orientation​(int oldTile50Pos)
      Takes the old inserting position and looks up the board position where the old tile50 is now. Then returns the orientation of this tile.
      Parameters:
      oldTile50Pos - The position where Tile50 was inserted last turn.
      Returns:
      The orientation of the tile that was inserted last
